sect1.title: Additional Help Sources
sect1.para:
For additional information, please, visit the &app; website at
http://pybliographer.org. There is a mailing list also, where you can get answers for your questions, you can report bugs, etc.

sect1.title: What's New in &app; &appversion;
sect1.para: You can find a complete list of bugs fixed and features added in the News and ChangeLog files supplied with the package. See the source tarball of pybliographer, or the default doc directory of your distribution (e.g. /usr/share/doc/pybliographer). Some of the features include:

listitem.para: Fixed multiple creation of entries, fixed bug related to creating a new field.
